title: Two juveniles shot in Mosby Court in Richmond
content:
RICHMOND, Va. (WRIC) — Two juveniles, a male and female, were shot in Mosby Court in Richmond Saturday night.
The incident happened in the 1900 block of Redd Street.
The victims have been transported to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries.
A white vehicle has been found in connection with the shooting and is being investigated by police. However, no arrests have been made and there are no known suspects at this time.
This is a developing story. Stay with 8News online and on air for the latest updates.
